collectible.title: Noire's cookies
collectible.subtitle: Black Heart taste (dark chocolate)
collectible.text: "I can bake, of course. Anyone can do it; it's enough to follow a recipe. The only secret ingredient you need to use is your feelings toward the person you make the cookies for... D-Don't misunderstand me! I don't necessarily mean liking or love, or things like that! It can just be the feelings of... gratitude and such!"

collectible.title: Black Heart's chocolates
collectible.subtitle: Handmade and heart-shaped
collectible.text: "You won again, even more convincingly than before. I'm glad you've become so strong. As a reward, accept these chocolates. I transformed into my goddess form before making them because I wanted them to be as delicious and look as pretty as possible... You do understand what I mean by their shape and by giving them to you on a day like this, so I don't have to say anything more... Right?"
collectible.unlock: Win another game against Noire, either during the Valentine's Day event or on the "romantic" background, and do not lose too many clothes.

collectible.title: Noire plushie
collectible.subtitle: Nowagurumi
collectible.text:
A gift to help you rest with a peace of mind when Noire herself cannot sleep next to you. Effectiveness confirmed by Uni.</br></br>
(Made by Plutia. She will happily present Noire with another one.)
collectible.unlock: Tire Noire and then let her experience something so unexciting that she falls asleep.

collectible.title: Noire and the plushie
collectible.subtitle: Only one of them has removable clothes
collectible.text: "You brought my plushie with you! That was cute, thank you! Hm? You want to take a picture of me sitting next to it? Okay, I may let you take one... as an exceptional one-time reward for how well you played today... How should I pose?</br></br>H-huh?! In just my sleeves, boots and thigh-highs?! You have some guts to ask a goddess for that! And some quite particular tastes! I do like cosplay, as you're the only one to know... but not that kind of cosplay! ...P-Probably not, at least!!...</br></br>W-Well... If you really want me to do it no matter what, then I will pose... just this once! But if you're to have a picture of me, I want it to be a good one, so be serious and take it properly!"
collectible.unlock: Have a certain collectible unlocked, play a game on the classroom background and win against Noire without losing too many clothes.

collectible.title: Noire's showdown lingerie
collectible.subtitle: ノワールの勝負下着
collectible.text:
Noire's favorite lingerie, which she gave to you as a keepsake after she lost it in a game of strip poker.
Maybe the next time you meet, Noire will wear a similar set of underwear, maybe a different one... and maybe none at all? </br></br>(It is a secret memento of your time spent with a pure-hearted goddess. Do not think about wearing it.)
collectible.unlock: Make Noire lose her lingerie and pose for you naked.
